inventory.description:
A common herb used in preparing tisanes.
- Restores 120 HP.
inventory.name: Greenwarish

inventory.description:
A herb common across the peninsula.
- Restores 30 HP.
inventory.name: Gransys Herb

inventory.description:
A herb that is the subject of many rumors.
It is said that it can change the fate of those who take it.
- Restores 100 HP.
inventory.name: Destiny Grass

inventory.description:
The milky water that remains from washing a hardy harspud.
-Restores 150 HP.
inventory.name: Harspud Milk
